description:
No need to Macgyver that freewheel off. Get the right tool for the job. This solid Freewheel Remover is made of heat-treated steel and has a 1-inch base to fit a wrench or bench vise.

  • Compatible with Atom®, Regina®, splined Zeus®, and some Schwinn®-approved freewheels
  • Has 20 splines and is approximately 21.6mm in diameter
name: Park Tool FR-4 Freewheel Remover
